description: This file defines a utility function for user authentication in a FastAPI application. It provides a simple, naive method to parse and validate an Authorization header, extracting user email information.

methods.name: get_current_user(authorization: Optional[str] = Header(default=None))
methods.description: A FastAPI dependency that retrieves the current user based on the provided Authorization header. It validates the token format and extracts the email address, raising an HTTP 401 error if validation fails.
